common.tagline: Encouraging and challenging you to seek intimacy with God every day.

translation_disclaimer.translate_english: As noted in the policy below, the English language version of the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use will govern your relationship with YouVersion. While the English version will govern, you can also use an automatic translation tool like Google Translate to view the documents in your language. Any further translation revisions will be posted on this page.

cookie-consent.legal_text: YouVersion uses cookies to personalize your experience.  By using our website, you accept our use of cookies as described in our <privacy_link>Privacy Policy</privacy_link>

header.app_ad_text: Read the Bible, discover plans, and seek God every day.

app.meta_title: Download The Bible App Now - 100% Free

app.title: Read God's Word with Bible App
app.connect: Connect with God’s Word every day.
app.description: Take God’s Word with you wherever you go by downloading the free Bible App. Listen to audio Bibles, create Prayers, study with Friends, and much more—all for free. Choose from more than 2,400 Bible versions in over 1,600 languages on your computer, phone, or tablet.
app.free: 100% free. No ads or purchases ever.
app.global_community: Join a global community with over 500 million people:
app.totally_free: 100% free. No ads or purchases ever.
app.listen: Listen to Audio Bible versions including:
app.listen_wherever: Listen to God’s Word wherever you are!
app.scan_code: Scan the QR Code with your mobile device to download Bible App.
app.available_languages: Available in more than {{language_count}} languages worldwide.
app.qrcode_instructions: Scan the QR Code with your mobile device to download Bible App.
app.what_people: What people are saying about the free Bible app...
app.audio_version_list: Listen to Bible audio versions including:
app.read_word: Read God’s Word with Bible App
app.take_word: Take God’s Word with you wherever you go by downloading the free Bible App. Listen to audio Bibles, create Prayers, study with Friends, and much more—all for free. Choose from more than 2,400 Bible versions in over 1,600 languages on your computer, phone, or tablet.
app.t1_copy: I've bookmarked passages that are important to me. I've even read the whole thing through in a year thanks to the reading plans.
app.t2_copy: I love how you are able to connect with friends and the Bible reading plans are awesome. This application helps me also to stay consistent in reading because it has reminders for the plans. It also gives me another way to come closer to God. Download this and read every day!
app.t3_copy: Great app with a wide selection of Bibles to choose from. ... The audio Bibles are also wonderful and easy to understand.
app.t4_copy: Many translations and languages available, and many that can be downloaded to read offline. Many useful features, such as the ability to make notes and bookmarks.
app.t5_copy: I love how it has a lot of versions and that there are verses of the day, devotions, plans and community. Thanks for this free app. :)
app.t6_copy: Great because there are many different versions and I could download multiple versions for offline reading. I'm able to listen to this app.
app.t7_copy: Helps me to read the bible more. Love the search and share features and the variety of ways to share. Also like the audio versions.
app.t8_copy: This is a great tool for studying from multiple translations. It's also convenient for listening to the bible when you're driving.
app.t9_copy: This is the best bible app out there. It has the word in different languages and versions for online and offline use. It has devotionals for everything you could think of. You can connect with others and ultimately learn about God and his Word.

home.completely_free: Bible App is completely free, with no advertising and no in–app purchases. It’s been installed on over half a billion devices!

metadata.description: Select any Bible verse or passage, linked directly to any of YouVersion’s 1,200+ versions, in 900+ languages. People viewing your Event can tap your reference to see it in their Bible App reader, where they can Bookmark it, Highlight it, and more.

verses.content: And you must love the LORD your God with all your heart, all your soul, and all your strength.

verses.content: “Honor your father and mother.” This is the first commandment with a promise
If you honor your father and mother, “things will go well for you, and you will have a long life on the earth.”

verses.content:
The people who walk in darkness
will see a great light.
For those who live in a land of deep darkness,
a light will shine.
